main.name: Kaustubh Pimparkar
main.bio: I am currently a graduate student at Santa Clara University with a majors in Computer Science and Engineering. I like dabbling in various parts of Web / RPA / C++ development and like to learn about new technologies, go for a hike or simply play games in my free time.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me via email, this form, or LinkedIn

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Engineered and maintained Transaction and Performance processing with CheckFreeâ€™s Global Investment Manager (GIM) system. Designed processes using database programming and shell scripting to do various tasks in the system, including Account Conversion, Performance Scheduling, Sub-Accounting. Created Automation Bots using UiPath to automate the UI Health Check of Banking Applications

work.title: Software Intern
work.description: Developed a voice feedback chatbot integrated in a web page using IBM Watson assistant (Bluemix) on a node server. Devised a complex dialogue for Watson assistant based on user input intents and extracted entities. Hosted the application on IBM cloud to ensure security and scalability of the application.
